appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Press Ctrl+Shift+F and start searching your links using your own tags.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

actionSearchPlaceholder.message: Lost? Type :help to access help page

helpNewSuggestionTagsPlaceholder.message: Enter a few letters and type space or enter to validate

helpUsageDesc1.message: To begin, press Ctrl+Shift+F to display the quicklaunch search bar. Now you can start typing some tags to display a list of filtered uri. After that, use the arrow keys in order to quickly navigate through the list of suggestions and the enter key to select a suggestion.

helpUsageDesc2.message: But how can I manage my suggestions? Go to the options page or use directly the quicklaunch search bar and the special commands.

helpCommandsQueryStringDesc.message: Open the selected suggestion and append the query string to the uri.

helpCommandsPrivDesc.message: Open the selected suggestion in a new private tab.

helpCommandsAllDesc.message: Open all suggestions matching tags in a new window.

helpCommandsHelpDesc.message: Open the options page and show the help tab.

helpCommandsSettingsDesc.message: Open the options page and show the suggestions tab.

helpCommandsAddDesc.message: Add the uri of the current tab as a suggestion with the tags passed in parameters.

helpCommandsEditDesc.message: Open the options page and show the suggestions tab with a filter. By default, the filter is the uri of the current tab. You can also select a custom suggestion to edit by specifying tags.
